thread.title: GWC Warranty VP of Marketing, Kate Eltringham, Named To Agent Entrepreneur's 40 Under 40
thread.title_full: GWC Warranty VP of Marketing, Kate Eltringham, Named To Agent Entrepreneur's 40 Under 40 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: GWC Warranty VP of Marketing, Kate Eltringham, Named To Agent Entrepreneur's 40 Under 40
text:
GWC Warranty
WILKES-BARRE, Pa. GWC Warranty, the best-in-class provider of used vehicle service contracts and related finance and insurance products sold through automotive dealers, is proud to announce that Vice President of Marketing, Kate Eltringham , has been named to Agent Entrepreneur's 40 Under 40.
Agent Entrepreneur, the automotive industry's leading source of news for automotive general agents, compiles the Annual 40 Under 40 list to recognize young executives "whose vision, hard work and accomplishments have set them apart as the industry's best and brightest."
Eltringham, who joined GWC Warranty in 2013, was selected to Agent Entrepreneur's 40 Under 40 from among numerous candidates throughout the automotive industry. Since joining GWC, Eltringham – an 11-year marketing veteran – has pioneered and led a new frontier for GWC's marketing to include, among countless other accomplishments:
Streamlining GWC's product set Implementation of multiple programs and initiatives aimed at rewarding top customers and improving customer retention Development of several innovative technological offerings such as the GWC Dealer Portal and GWC Virtual Training Fully refreshed brand image and messaging concepts Enhanced communications capabilities to better reach and engage GWC's agent and dealer partners "Kate's vision toward the future of not just our company, but the automotive industry as a whole, has played an integral role in GWC's growth into the industry's largest, best-in-class used vehicle service contract provider," said GWC CEO and President Rob Glander . "Under Kate's leadership, I am fully confident that GWC will continue to explore and implement new, innovative ways to help agents and dealers sell more cars and be more successful."
About GWC Warranty
Established in 1995, GWC Warranty is the largest, best-in-class provider of used vehicle service contracts in the automotive industry. Named a Motor Trend ® Recommended Best Buy for independent dealers, GWC Warranty is committed to providing its dealer partners with products, services, technology and training to make them more successful. GWC Warranty has helped bring a "No Worries, Just Drive" experience to more than 1.5 million drivers nationwide. GWC Warranty, rated A+ by the Better Business Bureau, is owned by Stone Point Capital, a Connecticut -based investment firm with aggregate committed capital of more than $13 Billion . For more information about GWC Warranty please visit www.GWCwarranty.com .
